144350.「おお <pc>！\n わしからの手紙は 読んでくれたか？\n おぬしに ぜひと:
Aye, <pc>! Did ya' read my letter?
I've been wantin' to meet with ya' for a
while.

144351.「聞いたぞ。竜族の世界ナドラガンドで\n ワイルドかつ デンジャラスな冒険を\n:
I heard that ya' had some wild and
exciting adventures in Nadragand.

144352.「うむ。おぬしの活躍の場は\n もはや アストルティアに留まらず\n ……と 言:
Aye, it seems like yer adventures have
extended far beyond Astoltia...
To say the least, eh?

144353.「……なんと。ナドラガンドで\n ふたたび <kyodai>と 出会えたのに\n:
Oh, now there's a surprise.
Ya' met <kyodai> in Nadragand
but were separated once again?

144354.「そうか……。\n おぬしたち ふたりに課せられた運命は\n なんとも 残酷なも:
I see...
Fate has been cruel to the two of you.

144355.「……ほう？\n <kyodai>が 残していったモノを\n 持っているというの:
...huh? Ya' have something that
<kyodai> left behind?

144356.「それは 興味ぶかいのう。\n わしにも ちょいと 見せてくれんか？<yesno:
Now that sure is interesting. Won't ya' let me
have a closer look at it?<yesno><close>

144357.「そう 言わんと……。\n <kyodai>が 残していったモノには\n わしも:
Don't be like that...
I'm very interested in what it is
that they left behind.

144358.「別に 取り上げたりせぬから\n 今すぐ わしに 見せてくれんか？<yesno>:
I'm not going to take it from you. I
just want a quick look at it.<yesno><close>

144359.<pc>は <kyodai>の残していった\n銀色の箱のようなものを ふところか:
<pc> took the silver cube-like
object that <kyodai> left behind
and handed it to Hollow.

144360.「ふ～む……。なんじゃろうな これは？\n おそらくは 錬金術で作られた\n な:
Hmmm...what is this? I think it's some kind
of device created by alchemy.

144361.「おっ？ こんなところに\n ボタンが 隠されておるようじゃ。\n これは 押さ:
What? There's a button here! I think I'll
just go ahead and press it!

144362.「む……。何も 起こらんのう。\n よくわからんが 壊れとるのかもしれん。\n:
Hmmm....
Nothing's happening. I don't know, maybe it's
broken. You can have it back.

144364.「うおっ？ なんじゃ なんじゃ。\n まさか 爆発するんじゃなかろうな！？:
What! Oh, no! Don't tell me it's going
to explode?!

144368.「……ううむ。どうやら ルシェンダさまに\n ちゃんと 報告しておかねばならぬ事:
Hmmm, this isn't good... I'd better go report
this little incident to Lushenda.

144386.「メレアーデ様 お待たせしました。\n お茶のおかわりを お持ちしま……:
Thank you for waiting, Mereade.
I've brought you another cup of tea.

144390.「今の悲鳴は なんだ！？\n 入るぞ 姉さん！: What was that screaming? I'm coming in!

144392.「貴様 どこから 入った？\n ここを ドミネウスの屋敷と知っての\n ろうぜき:
Who are you, and where did you come from?
Don't you know whose mansion this is?!

144396.「姉さんは 下がって！\n 無断で 人の屋敷に立ち入るような相手だ。:
Get back! This is a dangerous madman who
would dare break into our home!

144398.「俺たちの命を狙う 暗殺者かもしれない！:
They must be an assassin who have come to
kill us!

144400.「動きは 封じた。\n よし。ひっとらえろ！: I've got them bound! Apprehend them at once!

144406.「エテーネ王国の技術が 使われているな。\n だが なんだ……？\n それだけで:
This is technology from the Kingdom of Ethene,
isn't it? But...what is it? I can't quite put my
finger on it...

144408.「……何にせよ 王都に忍び込んで\n 盗みだしたものに ちがいないだろう。\n:
Whatever it is, you must have snuck into the
Royal Capital and stole it. I'll be taking it
back!

144410.<pc>は クオードに\n銀色の箱を 取り上げられてしまった！:
<pc> had their Silver Cube taken
away by Quard!

144412.「空いてる部屋に ぶち込んでおけ。\n しっかり カギをかけるのを忘れるなよ。:
Throw them into an empty room! Make sure the
door is locked up tight.

144414.<pc>は 身動きの取れぬまま\nメレアーデの部屋から 連れだされ\n物置に 閉:
<pc> was taken out of Mereade's
room and was locked in a storeroom, unable
to move at all!

144443.<pc>と メレアーデは\n手分けして クオードの部屋の中を探した。:
<pc> and Mereade split up and
searched Quard's room.

144444.しかし 銀色の箱は\nどこからも 見つからなかった……。: But the Silver Cube was nowhere to be found...

144451.「……なるほど。クオード様が\n おでかけになられたときの様子を\n 聞かせてほ:
I understand. You would like to know what
happened when Master Quard left.

144452.「しかし なぜ お客様が\n そのようなことを 気になさるのです？:
But why would a guest like yourself care about
such things?

144453.「私には 屋敷の主人と そのご家族を\n お守りする義務が ございますゆえ\n:
I am obligated to protect the owner of the
house and his family, so I cannot answer your
questions.

144456.「これは メレアーデ様。\n あなたまで いらっしゃるとは いったい……。:
Ah, Lady Mereade! I'm surprised to see you
here, too...

144458.「メレアーデ様……。\n 私ども相手とはいえ お客様のいる前で\n そのような言:
Lady Mereade, please don't use such informal
language. Especially in front of our guests.

144460.「いいですか メレアーデ様。\n 正しい 言葉づかいというものは\n つね日頃か:
Listen to me, Lady Mereade. Proper language is
always a...

144462.「ごまかそうとしても ダメです。\n 今日という今日は……:
You're not getting out of this, Lady Mereade.
Not until you...

144465.「クオード様のご様子は 普段と変わらずでした。\n 何か 特別なものを 持ってい:
Master Quard seemed the same as usual. It
didn't look as though he had anything special
on his person.

144467.「いえ。たいしたことでは。\n それよりも 先ほどの約束の件……:
It's my pleasure, Lady Mereade. Just
remember our earlier conversation...

144471.「あっ こっ これは メレアーデ様。\n 今日も ごきげん うるわしくっ……。:
Oh, Lady Mereade, i-it's you! I hope you are
having a pleasant day...

144477.「はいぃっ なんなりとっ！: Y-yes! Ask me anything you want!

144479.「いぇ……。私は 見ていませんっ。: No, I haven't seen anything like that...

144481.「ぇっと……。クオード様が ご自分の部屋から\n おでかけになるところは 見まし:
Well, I saw Master Quard leave his room, but I
didn't see anything unusual.

144482.「でも そう言えば クオード様の部屋から\n 先輩のポーラさんが 出てくるのを見:
But come to think of it...I saw my senior
Paula coming out of Master Quard's room. I
think she might have been holding something...

144484.「はいぃ！ よく わかりませんが\n お役に立てたのでしょうかっ……？:
Yes! I don't know what this is all about,
but I hope I've been helpful to you...?

144486.「ポーラさんなら 今は\n 侍女たちの部屋に おられると思いますっ。: I think Paula is in the maid's room right now.

144490.「メレアーデ様まで なぜ ここに……。\n お客様と ふたりで また何か\n 変:
Oh? What brings you here, Lady Mereade?
I hope you aren't playing any strange games
with the guests again...

144492.「私は ウソなど 申しません。: I would never lie to you.

144497.「……申し訳ありません。\n 銀色の箱を クオード様の部屋から\n 持ちだしたの:
I apologize...it was me who took that silver
cube out of Master Quard's room.

144498.「あまりに きれいな箱だったので\n つい 出来心で……。\n すぐに お返しい:
The cube was so beautiful, and I just couldn't
help myself... I will return it to you
immediately.

144502.「……先日のことです。\n 母が病に倒れたと 家から 連絡がありました。\n そ:
...The other day, I received a call from home
that my mother had fallen ill. With a very
serious illness, at that...

144503.「治すためには 高価な薬が 必要らしく。\n あの箱を売れば それが 工面できる:
The doctors say expensive medicine is needed
to cure her, so I thought if I sold the cube,
I could...

144505.「私は この屋敷に勤める者です。\n 屋敷のものには 手が出せませんでした……。:
I work for Master Domineus, so I could never
take anything that belongs to him or his
family.

144507.「わかっては いたのです。\n ですが……申し訳ありません。\n 屋敷を追いださ:
I knew that. But...I am sorry. I am prepared
to be evicted from the mansion.

144511.「お客様。まことに 申し訳ありませんでした。\n 銀色の箱は ２階の 東側の客間:
Dear guest, I am terribly sorry. I hid the
silver cube under the bed in the guest room
on the east side of the second floor.

144524.メレアーデは 黒ネコのチャコルを追いかけて\n部屋から 出ていってしまった……。:
Mereade chased after her cat Charcoal, and
left the room...

144525.どこからともなく 声が聞こえてきた。: A voice was heard from out of nowhere.

144526.<center><pc>……。\n屋敷の３階…… テラスへ来て。\n今すぐに……:
<pc>...meet me on the
third floor terrace... Hurry...

144531.<pc>は メレアーデから\n記憶の赤結晶（だいじなもの）を 託された！<me:
<pc> was entrusted with
the Red Memory Crystal (Key Item) by Mereade!<me 60>

144536.「聞こえていることを 確認したキュ。: Good to know you can hear me, kyu.

144537.「現在の状況を説明するので\n だまって ボクの話を聞くキュ。:
I'll explain the situation here, so calm down
and listen to me, kyu.

144538.「おっと 自己紹介を忘れていたキュ。\n ボクは…… そうキュね。\n キュルル:
Oops, I forgot to introduce myself. My name
is Kyururu.

144539.「時の妖精……と 思ってもらえれば\n おおむね 支障はないはずキュ。:
If it helps, you can just think of me as a
"time fairy", kyu.

144540.「ついでに 言っておくと\n このキューブは エテーネルキューブ。\n いわゆる:
I'll tell you something else. This kyube is
 known as the Ethernel Kyube, a so-called
"time travel device", kyu.

144541.「エテーネの民が その身に宿す\n 時渡りのチカラを使い 時間と空間を超えた\n:
The people of Ethene are born with the power
of time travel, but with the kyube, they can
make their way through space and time with
precision, kyu.

144542.「キューブを使わずに 時間跳躍をすると\n 時間がズレたり 目的地を見失ったり…:
Try time travelling without the kyube, you
can end up in the wrong time, or the wrong
place...It's not a good idea, kyu.

144543.「キミからは 強い 時渡りのチカラが\n 感知できるけど どうも\n 使いかたが:
I can sense strong time travel powers within
you, but you don't seem to know how to use
them, kyu.

144544.「だから このボクが キューブを使って\n チカラの調整と 時間跳躍ポイントの計:
So, I'll use the kyube to adjust your powers
and calculate the time leap point. Don't
worry, I'll be right behind you, kyu.

144545.「……というわけで！\n この危険な世界から 即時退散することを\n ボクは 提:
Alright! Lets get out of this dangerous
world, kyu!

144546.「くわしい説明は 後でするキュ！\n キューブの 緊急起動を開始するキューッ！:
Don't worry, I'll explain more later. For
now, cue emergency kyube time travel, kyu!

144547.「おおおっ 帰ってきおったか！\n 心配したんじゃぞ <pc>！！:
Oh, yer' back! We were worried about
ya', <pc>!

144548.「突然 目の前から 消えてしまうから\n そりゃあ もう シリアスかつ\n クレ:
I was in such a serious and crazy panic when
you suddenly disappeared right in front of
my eyes!

144549.「ふ～む……。どうやら おぬしは\n わしには 予想もつかぬ体験を\n してきた:
Hmmm...From the look in you eyes, I can tell
that you've had quite the experience.

144550.「今回のことは ルシェンダさまにも\n ちゃんと 報告してあるんじゃ。\n そち:
I spoke to Sage Lushenda after you vanished.
Lets go see her, then we can speak more
about what you saw.

144551.「<pc>よ。今すぐに\n 城の２階の 賢者の執務室へ来てくれ。:
<pc>. Meet me in Sage Lushenda's
office whenever you're ready.

144552.「おい あんた。\n 待ち合わせは もう すんだんだろ？:
Hey, you. You already have a rendezvous, don't
you?

144553.「このベンチは オレのお気に入りの\n 休息スポットなんだよ。\n 用がないなら:
This bench is my favorite spot to rest. If you
don't need me, I'll sit down.

144554.「おお <pc>。よく来てくれた。\n ホーローから 話は聞いているが\n いっ:
Oh <pc>. Welcome.
 Hollow spoke to me after you disappeared.
What on earth happened to you?

144555.<pc>は エテーネルキューブを見せ\nエテーネ王国へ とばされ\nメレアーデた:
<pc> showed the Ethernal Cube,
and spoke of their journey to the Kingdom of
Ethene, where they met Mereade.

144556.そして 破壊の限りをつくされた\nレンダーシアの大地に 行ってしまったことを\n:
You told them that you had been sent to the
future Lendersia, which had been completely
destroyed.

144557.「なんと エテーネ王国に 行ったとな！？\n エテーネの民の 末裔のひとりとして:
What! You've gone to the Kingdom of Ethene!
With you being a descendant of the people of
Ethene, this is something we should look into

144558.「……たしか エテーネ王国は\n ５０００年ほど前に 滅びたとされる国だな。:
...If I remember correctly, the Kingdom of
Ethene was destroyed 5000 years ago

144559.「つまり そなたは はるか過去の世界へと\n 行っていたということになる。\n:
In other words, you travelled to a world
that existed long, long ago. Far in the
past.

144560.「しかし 破壊されたレンダーシアとは\n いったい どういうことなのだ……？:
But as for the destroyed Lendersia...I'm not
sure what that could mean.

144561.「疑問点の解消が 必要と判断したキュ。\n 詳細な説明は ボクがするキュ。:
Kyuuu...I see I need to clear things up. Very
well, I'll explain in detail, kyu.

144562.「ボクのことは キュルルと呼ぶキュ。\n これを 住居にしている 時の妖精キュ。:
I'm Kyururu, a time fairy. I live here
inside this kyube, kyu.

144563.「……時の妖精？\n そのような存在は 聞いたことがないが……。:
A time fairy? I've never heard of such a
thing...

144564.「時を渡る エテーネルキューブに宿り\n そのチカラを 制御することができるから:
It's just what I call myself, kyu. Since I
live in the Ethernal Kyube and control it's
time travel powers.

144565.「あるとき キューブを起動した人物\n <kyodai>と 出会い\n ともに:
One day, I met <kyodai>
the person who activated the kyube, and we
spent a lot of time together, kyu.

144566.「ほうほう……。<kyodai>と\n 一緒に 暮らしていたと言うのか。\n も:
What's that now? Yer a friend of
<kyodai>'s?! Please, tell me more about
them!

144567.「ダメだキュ。別時間軸の人間に\n これ以上のことは 語れないキュ。\n 時間波:
No can do, kyu. If I reveal too much to a
person from another time axis, it can cause
fluctuations and other temporal disasters, kyu

144568.「時の妖精とやらのことは 今はよい。\n 気になるのは <pc>が行ったという\:
I don't care about the time fairies right now
I'm more interested in what <pc>
saw. The destroyed Lendersia.

144569.「何か知っているなら 聞かせてくれ。:
If you know something about that, please tell
us.

144570.「あれは ひと言で言えば 少し先の未来キュ。: Put simply, that was the near future, kyu.

144571.「この世界は 近いうちに滅び\n 終末の光景へと 成り果てるキュ。:
Very soon the world and everyone in it will
be completely annihilated, kyu.

144572.「そんなバカな……。\n とうてい 信じられぬ話だ。: That's absurd... I can't believe it.

144573.「しかし 他ならぬ <pc>が\n その目で 見てきたのならば\n 信じぬわけに:
But if <pc> has seen it with his own
eyes, how can we not believe it...

144574.「我々に 滅びの未来を\n 回避する手段は 何か ないのか？: Is there anything we can do to prevent this?

144575.「可能性なら あるキュ。\n <pc>が 過去から持ってきた 物体から\n 大き:
There is a possibility, kyu. I detected large
temporal fluctuations from an object
<pc> brought from the past.

144576.「過去から持ってきた……？\n そういえば エテーネ王国で会った女性から\n 記:
An item from the past, eh? Didn't ya' say
that Mereade lass gave ya' some kind of
"red memory crystal"?

144577.「その 記憶の赤結晶を\n あるべき時間 あるべき場所へ運ぶことで\n ゆらぎは:
By bringing the memory crystal to the right
place at the right time, the fluctuations
should converge, kyu.

144578.「ゆらぎの収束により 一度 確定された未来が\n 異なる未来の可能性に 紡ぎなお:
These fluctuations might give us a chance of
changing the currently determined future, kyu!

144579.「たしか <pc>は\n その記憶の赤結晶を クオードとやらに\n 届けろと 言:
You were told to deliver the crystal to this
"Quard" person, right?

144580.「そうか……。\n どうやら <pc>には もう一度\n 過去へ とんでもらう必:
Well... it looks like you'll need to
go back in time again.

144581.「ただ……現状では それは\n 無理だと 言わざるを得ないキュ。: Well...there's a small problem with that, kyu

144582.「キューブのエナジー残量が ゼロに近く\n 再度の時間跳躍は 不可能だキュ。:
The kyube's nearly out of energy, making
another time leap impossible, kyu.

144583.「それでは 打つ手なしではないか。\n どうすれば いいっちゅーんじゃ！:
By the Gods! So we're all doomed then?! Is
there no way for us to recharge the cube?

144584.「アルケミダストが 入手できれば\n キューブに エナジー供給が可能だキュ。:
If you can get me some Alchemidust, I can
use it to recharge the kyube, kyu.

144585.「アルケミダストは 高位の錬金術をした際に\n 作られる残留物で 通常は廃棄され:
Alchemidust is a residue created by high
level alchemy, kyu. It's useless to most,
but I can use it to recharge the kyube, kyu.

144586.「でも 職人がおこなう ツボ錬金やランプ錬金や\n <pc>の 錬金釜ていどの錬:
And before you ask: Pot Alchemy, Lamp Alchemy
and <pc>'s Alchemy Pot are too
mundane to make Alchemidust, kyu

144587.「むう……。\n では そのような 高位の錬金をおこなう者は\n 今の時代には:
Hmmm. So is there no one who can perform such
high level alchemy in todays day and age?

144588.「エテーネの島に 行ってみるといいキュ。\n バルザックの遺産が あるかもしれな:
We could check the Island of Ethene, kyu. We
might be able to find the legacy of the great
alchemist, Baalzack.

144589.「バルザック……。\n その名は 聞いたことがある。\n 究極へと至らんとした:
Baalzack...I've heard that name before. He
was a legendary alchemist who did many
impressive yet terrible things.

144590.「自らの術を高めるため 人の道を外れた\n 非道の錬金術師の名前キュ。\n <k:
I heard this from <kyodai>,kyu.
Baalzack gave up his own humanity so he could
perfect his art, kyu

144591.「バルザックは エテーネの島のあちこちに\n ほこらを立てて 多くの錬金術師をお:
Baalzack built many towers across the island
of Ethene, kyu. He used them to lure
alchemists in and steal their power, kyu.

144592.「そのほこらが 遺跡として 残っているキュ。\n エテーネ島に住む 錬金術師なら:
If Alchemidust exists in this time, it'll be
in those towers, kyu. An alchemist living on
Ethene might know more about it, kyu.

144593.「ふむ……。\n その遺跡に アルケミダストとやらが\n 残されているかもしれな:
Hmmm. So you're saying there might be some
Alchemidust left behind in those ruins?

144594.「……今は それに期待するしかあるまい。\n <pc>に エテーネの島まで\n:
...we'll just have to hope for the best for
now. I'll ask <pc> to go to the
Island of Ethene.

144595.「そなたが エテーネ島に住む 錬金術師に\n 心当たりがあるならば まず\n そ:
If you know of an alchemist who lives on the
island of Ethene, you can start by meeting
him.

144596.「頼んだぞ <pc>。\n わしは なんぞ 役に立つ情報がないか\n 外に しら:
We're all countin' on ya', <pc>
While yer out I'll see if I can dig up some
info on the Kingdom of Ethene.

144597.「周囲に 強烈なエナジー反応を検知。\n アルケミダストである可能性は\n ８９:
Kyu? I'm detecting a strong energetic
reaction in the area. There's a good chance
it's Alchemidust, kyu.

144598.「<cs_pchero> <cs_pchero>。\n アルケミダストの反応は\:
<pc>. The Alchemidust
readings are coming from this thing, kyu.

144599.「やっつけて たしかめてみるキュ。\n ボクは キューブの中に 一時撤退キュ！:
I'll let you figure out how to deal with it.
I'm going to go have a nap inside the kyube,
kyu.

144601.「アルケミダストの反応は\n こいつから 出ているんだキュ。\n 今度こそ やっ:
The Achemidust reaction is coming from this
thing. Kill it just to be sure, kyu.

144605.「ボクの解析によると ただのスライムが\n アルケミダストを 体内に取り込んで\:
According to my analysis, this slime absorbed
the Alchemidust and grew, kyu.

144606.「<cs_pchero> <cs_pchero>！\n これだキュ。アルケミダス:
<pc>, bring the kyube here, kyu. We
should have enough Alchemidust to charge it,
kyu.

144607.「さっそく エナジー変換して\n キューブに チャージを開始するキュ。:
I'll start charging up the kyube right away,
kyu.

144608.「エナジーが 完全に チャージされるまで\n しばらく 時間がかかる予定だキュ。:
It's going to take a while for me to fully
charge the kyube, kyu.

144609.「<cs_pchero>には 外見的要素が\n 生体継続時間と一致しない 女賢者:
While I work on recharging the kyube, why
don't we go back and report to your Sage
friends, kyu.

144610.「<pc> ご苦労。\n 時の妖精の言っていた アルケミダストは\n 手に入った:
Ah, <pc>, welcome back. Did you
manage to find the Alchemidust the time fairy
mentioned?

144611.「キューブへの エナジーチャージは\n 先ほど 完了したキュ。:
No need to worry. The kyube's energy has just
been recharged, kyu.

144612.「おお。つまり キューブは\n すぐにでも 使えるということだな。: Ah. So does this mean the cube is ready to go?

144613.「では <pc>よ。\n 滅びの未来を 食い止めるために\n ふたたび 過去の世:
Well then, <pc>.Can I ask you to
return to the past, so you can change the
future?

144614.「またしても そなたに頼ることになるが\n これは 時渡りのチカラを持つ\n そ:
I wish I could be of more help, but as you
are the only one here with the power of time
travel, this is something only you can do.

144615.「その前に 言っておきたいことがある。\n わしは エテーネ王国について知るため:
However, I can at least provide you with some
information. I have been doing research into
the ancient Kingdom of Ethene.

144616.「高度な錬金術により 栄華を誇った王国だが\n ５０００年前に 突如として 滅ん:
Very few details remain. We know they were prosperous due to their advanced alchemical technology, and that they were somehow
destroyed around 5000 years ago.

144617.「つまるところ おぬしは これから\n 滅んだ原因も定かではない エテーネ王国へ:
Keep that in mind. Nobody knows what
destroyed the Kingdom of Ethene, and you may
very well get caught up in it.

144618.「そして そこでの選択が 我々の未来をも\n 変えていくことに なるやもしれん。:
Another thing to keep in mind: Yer choices in
the past could drastically alter our future.

144619.「おぬしの持つ 時渡りのチカラも\n 決して 万能なものではない。\n これまで:
Yer power of time travel isn't foolproof, so
be careful about the things ya' say and do
in the past.

144620.「それじゃ 時間跳躍を開始するキュ。\n 時間設定…… ５０１２年前。:
Alright, if we're done talking, lets begin
our time leap, kyu. Time set: 5012 years
ago, kyu!

144621.「ポイント設定…… エテーネ王国。\n メレアーデのいた屋敷に\n ピンポイント:
Location set: Kingdom of Ethene...I'll do my
best to land us back in Mereade's Mansion,kyu.

144622.「……設定完了。\n エテーネルキューブ 起動するキュ！:
Setup complete...Alright, activating
Ethernal Kyube, kyu!

144637.「<pc>。あそこの崩れたカベから\n 外へ出られると 推測できるキュ。:
<pc>, we might be able to
get out through that collapsed wall over
there, kyu.

144638.「複数の生体反応が 接近中。\n 武装している可能性 ９２パーセント。\n ボク:
I'm detecting multiple bio-signs. There's a
92 percent chance they're armed, too. I
think I'll go hide in the kyube for now, kyu

144639.「ここから 入れそうですよ。\n 調査なら 楽な任務かと思いましたが\n めんど:
It looks like you can get in from here. I
thought the survey would be an easy mission,
but it's turning out to be a hassle.

144640.「とりあえず 屋敷の中に 入ってみよう。\n みんな 注意をおこたるなよ。:
Alright, let's head inside the villa. Stay
sharp, everyone.

144641.「だいぶ 荒らされているな……。\n どうやら 魔物が入り込んでいるようだ。:
Man...they really ransacked this place, huh.
Looks like monsters have made their way in
here too.

144643.「……ふーむ。\n エテーネ王国の者には 見えませんねえ。:
You don't look like a citizen of the Kingdom
of Ethene...

144644.「ここで 何をしてやがる！\n もしかして 野盗のたぐいってか？:
So what is it you're doing here? You some
kind of scavenger?

144645.「私は ローベル。\n 我々は この辺りの警備をまかされている\n エテーネ王国:
I'm Robel. Me and my team here are soldiers
in the Ethenian Frontier Guard. We've been
tasked with securing this area.

144646.「……貴殿は 旅の者と見た。\n 何用で 訪れたのかは知らぬが\n この屋敷は今:
...So you're a traveller, huh? Well, I don't
know how you got in here, but you should
leave. There's monsters around here.

144647.「即刻 立ち去ったほうがいい。\n 我々の詰所が そう 遠くない場所にある。\n:
You should leave immediately. Our outpost
isn't far from here. I'd recommend you
head over if you need a safe place to rest.

144648.「だが 我々は 調査任務があるため\n 貴殿を 送っていくことは できない。\n:
Unfortunately, we're here on a surveying
mission, so we can't escort you. You'll have
to get there on you own.

144649.「……だとさ。\n よかったな あんた。\n 普通なら しょっぴかれてるところだ:
Consider yourself lucky. Normally we would
have just arrested you for trespassing.

144650.「この者の目は 犯罪者のものではない。\n 責任は 私が取る。:
This one doesn't look like a criminal. I
think we can trust them...for now.

144651.「警備隊の詰所は このバントリユ地方の東だ。\n 気をつけて 向かうがいい。:
The guard post is just east of here in Bantryu
Region. Be careful on your way there.

144652.「……よし。\n 我々は 屋敷の奥へ 調査に向かうぞ。:
Alright! We're heading back in to the villa
to investigate.

144654.「魔物と 戦うことになるなら\n この任務 辞退すれば よかったですねえ。\n:
If I knew we were going to be fighting
monsters I would have declined this mission...

144655.「……そこで 待て。\n これより先は エテーネ王国の誇る\n 王都キィンベルで:
Stop right there. Beyond here is Kimbel,
the glorious royal capital of the Kingdom of
Ethene.

144656.「そなたの名を 告げよ。\n 指針書に記された者か 確認をおこなう。:
Tell me your name. I will confirm if you
are one of those listed in the guidelines.

144657.自分の名前を 門番に 告げますか？<yesno><close>: Do you give your name to the gatekeeper?<yesno><close>

144658.「名を 告げぬのならば\n 王都へ入れることは できん。\n すぐに 立ち去るが:
If you can't tell me your name, I'm going to
have to ask you to leave.

144660.「我らの持つ指針書に 記された者しか\n 王都へ入ることは 許可できない決まりだ:
By the royal decree of the King, only those
whose names are written in the guidebook may
enter the Royal City. Please leave now.

144661.「おお。貴殿も 今 着いたところか。: Oh? I'm surprised to see you here.

144662.「貴殿と会った後 屋敷の奥へ向かったが\n 思ったよりも 中の魔物が 手ごわくて:
After we parted ways, we went deep into the
villa. The monsters were far stronger than I
imagined so we had to fall back for today.

144664.「お前 あそこにいて よく無事だったな。\n 運のいいヤツだぜ。:
I'm surprised you survived a place like that
You're a lucky guy.

144665.「貴殿には 隊長の所まで 同行を願おう。\n ドミネウス邸に いたのには\n 何:
I'm going to have to ask you to come with me
to the captains office. I want the full story
of why you were in Domineus' Mansion.

144666.「私は 隊長に 増員の許可をもらってくる。\n ディークと イガラの両名は\n:
I will also be asking the captain for
reinforcements. In the meantime, you two get
some rest.

144668.「隊長は ２階にいる。\n ついてくるがいい。: The captain is on the second floor. Follow me.

144669.「ラゴウ隊長。ドミネウス邸の調査の件\n 増員を 願いたいのですが。:
Captain Lago, sir! I'd like to request more
men for the investigation of Domineus' mansion

144670.「なに？ ただの調査任務のはずだが\n お前たちだけでは 足りないと言うのか？:
Huh? It was supposed to be a simple survey
mission. Were your men not enough?

144672.「……はっ！ 屋敷内には 魔物が侵入しており\n 我々 ３名だけでは 苦戦をまぬ:
Yes sir! The mansion was overrun with
monsters. More than the three of us were able
to handle. We decided to retreat for now.

144673.「……しかたあるまい。増員を許可する。\n 人選は お前にまかせる。:
Very well, you can have your reinforcements
I'll let you decide who to take.

144675.「……ところで ローベル。\n お前の横にいる そいつは なんだ？: By the way, Robel. Who's that beside you?

144676.「はっ。我々が 調査に訪れたとき\n 屋敷にいた 旅の者です。\n 事情がありそ:
Sir, they were a traveller we found in the
mansion. I told them to come here since they
seemed to be lost.

144677.「ふん……。屋敷にいただと？\n ならば そいつは\n ただの不法侵入者ではない:
They were in the mansion? Then they're just
a common trespasser.

144678.「おおかた 王都に行こうとして\n 道に迷ったのだろうが そんな話は後だ。\n:
It's more likely that they just got lost on
their way to the Royal City, but we can talk
more about that later. For now, I think I...

144680.「なんだ 今の悲鳴は！？: What the hell was that screaming?

144681.「ディークの声のようです。\n いったい 何が……。:
It sounds like Deak's voice. What in the
world...

144682.「たっ たたたっ 隊長！\n 魔物……っ 魔物の襲撃だっ。\n 何人か やられち:
C-captain! Monster! A monster is attacking!
It's slaughtering us!

144683.「なに！？ この辺りの魔物が\n 詰所を 襲ってきたことなど\n 今までに 一度:
What! How is this possible. There are no
monsters bold enough to directly attack our
outpost!

144684.「それが はじめて見るヤツで\n オマケに なんか 普通じゃなくて……！: I've never seen anything like these, captain.

144692.「な……。なんなんだ あの魔物はっ。\n あんなのは 見たことがないぞ！！:
What... what is that monster? I've never seen
anything like that before!

144693.「それに なんだ あの態度は！！\n 我々には もう興味がないとでも\n 言いた:
And why was it behaving like that. It just
walked away, like it wasn't interested in us
anymore.

144694.「死んでは いないのか？\n まるで 生気を抜かれたような……。:
He isn't dead.
It's almost like he was drained of his
energy.

144696.「ダメか……。とにかく\n このまま 放っておくわけには いかんな。:
It's no good...I can't just leave things
like this...

144697.奇妙な魔物に襲われた 詰所の兵たちは\n皆 生気を抜かれたかのようになり\n動か:
The soldiers at the camp were attacked by an
unknown monster, which drained nearly all of
their energy.

144698.ラゴウ隊長の命により 彼らは\n襲撃をまぬがれた兵士によって 治療のため\n王都:
The captain ordered all injured soldiers be
sent to the capital to receive medical
attention.

144699.「うむむ……。なんということだ。\n ほとんどの隊員が あの魔物１匹に\n やら:
Damn. Never would have thought nearly all
our soldiers would be taken out by a single
monster.

144701.「はっ……。\n 逃げていく あやつの後を追い\n 西のほら穴へ 入り込むのを確:
Sir! I followed the monster after it left
here. It's making it's home in a cave to the
west.

144702.「私ひとりでは 太刀打ちできぬと判断し\n 報告に戻った次第です。:
I knew I couldn't kill it on my own, so I
came back here.

144703.「ぬう。そうか……。\n しかし あれを放置しておいて\n また ここを襲ってき:
I understand. However, if we leave that thing
alone, it might come back to finish what it
started.

144704.「おお そうだ！\n そこのお前 荒事は得意なのだろう？\n 風体を見れば すぐ:
You there! You seem like you know your way
around a fight. I can tell just by looking
at you.

144705.「お前に 仕事を与えよう。\n あの魔物を 退治しに向かうのだ。\n 屋敷への不:
I have a task for you. Go to the cave and
kill that demon. Come back alive, and I'll
forgive you for the trespassing incident..

144706.「しかし この者だけでは……。\n 私も ともに 向かわせてください！:
Sir, with all due respect, they shouldn't go
alone. At least let me...

144707.「ならん！ お前は ここに残れ。\n わしの護衛が いなくなってしまうからな。:
No! You stay here. After what just happened
I can't afford to lose any more guards.

144708.「よいな？ お前に 他の選択肢はない。\n あの魔物……。:
Understood? This is our only option now.
That monster...

144709.「……むう。名がないと不便だな。: Hmmm, we should probably give it a name.

144710.「……よし。異形のケダモノということで\n あれを 異形獣と名づけよう！\n 我:
...Right. Lets call them "Hexabeasts" for now
Fits the creatures well, don't you think?

144711.「ローベルの言った 西のほら穴に向かい\n 異形獣を 退治してくるのだ。\n 倒:
You must go to the western cave Robel
mentioned and take down that Hexabeast. If
you survive, bring back proof of your success

144712.「……ご命令ならば 仕方ありません。\n 私は 隊長の護衛として 残ります。:
Very well. I will stay behind and guard the
outpost.

144713.「どうした？ 異形獣がいるのは\n ここより 西のほら穴だ。\n わかったら ぐ:
What's wrong? The Hexabeasts are in a cave
to the west of here. Get going already!

144718.「ボクの解析によれば あのツノには\n 生命体から 特殊なエナジーを\n 抽出す:
According to my analysis, the horn has the
ability to absorb a persons energy, kyu.

144719.「でも <cs_pchero>の持つ そのエナジーが\n ぼうだいなため 許容量:
But you've got more energy than most, kyu.
It must have filled up the horn past it's
max capacity, which is why this happened, kyu

144720.「それにしても おかしな魔物キュ。\n ボクも 見たことがない種類だったキュ。:
Still, that was a strange creature. Even I've
never seen anything like that before, kyu.

144721.「たしか 隊長とかいう人間が\n 倒した証拠の品がどうとか 言っていたキュ。\n:
That captain said he wanted evidence if we
beat the creature. We should take the horn
with us.

144723.辺境警備隊の詰所に向かい ラゴウ隊長に\n異形獣を倒したことを 報告しよう。:
Go to the Frontier Guard Post and report to
Commander Lago that you have defeated the
Hexabeast.

144724.「おおっ！ これは まさしく\n あの異形獣のアタマにあった ツノだな！！:
Wow! No doubt about it, that's the horn of
that Hexabeast.

144725.「見れば見るほど 不思議なツノだ。\n よし。こいつは わしのコレクションに\n:
It's got a mysterious aura to it, don't you
think? I can't stop looking at it. I think
I'll add it to my collection!

144726.「……よくやった。約束どおり\n お前の 屋敷への無断侵入の罪は\n わしの権限:
Well done! As promised, I will use my right
as captain of the frontier guard to pardon
your trespassing charge.

144727.「だが その前に もう ひとはたらき\n してもらわないと いかん。\n ちょっ:
But first, I need you do a bit more work for
me.

144728.ラゴウ隊長は 机の上に紙を広げて\nもうれつな勢いで 何かを書きはじめた。:
Commander Lago spread out a sheet of paper on
his desk and began to write something at a
furious pace.

144729.そして 書いた内容をながめて\nうむうむと うなずくと\nその紙を 封筒に入れて:
He looked at what he had written, nodded his
head, put the paper in an envelope, and sealed
it.

144730.「これを 王都キィンベルの軍司令部にいる\n 軍団長まで すみやかに 届けてくれ:
Please deliver this to the Commander at the
army headquarters in the Royal City of Kimbel.

144731.「異形獣の出現により 屋敷の調査が\n 不可能になったことを書いた 報告書だ。:
It's a report regarding the Hexabeasts, as
well as our current inability to investigate
Domineus' Mansion

144732.「……ついでに わしの王都への\n 配置転換も 陳情しておいたがな。:
I also made a request to be transfered to
Kimbel.

144733.「お前も 王都に 用があるのだろう？\n これで 大手を振って 入れるのだ。\n:
Don't you have business in Kimbel too? You
should be very thankful. With this report
they should let you enter freely.

144735.「王都キィンベルへは ここより 南から\n エテーネ王国領に入り 北を目指せばい:
To get to the Royal City, head south of here to the Kingdom of Ethene area. Then, head north. Don't worry, the city is hard to
miss. Make sure you head straight there, okay?

144736.「……そこで 待て。\n これより先は エテーネ王国の誇る\n 王都キィンベルで:
Stop right there. Beyond here is Kimbel,
the glorious royal capital of the Kingdom of
Ethene.

144737.「そなたの名と用件を 告げよ。\n 指針書に記された者か 確認をおこなう。:
Tell me your name and your business. I will
check to see if you are listed in the
guidelines.

144738.自分の名前と ラゴウ隊長の報告書を\n持ってきたことを 門番に 告げますか？<y:
Tell the gatekeeper your name and show them
Captain Lagos' report?<yesno><close>

144739.「名と用件を 告げぬのならば\n 王都へ入れることは できん。\n すぐに 立ち:
If you do not tell us your name and what you
want, you will not be allowed into Royal City.
You may leave at once.

144741.「先ほど 指針書を確認した際に\n たしかに そのような者が来ることが\n 記さ:
Ah yes. Your name and business was foretold
when I last checked the guidelines.

144743.「軍司令部にいくならば 王都に入ったら\n 大通りを まっすぐ 進めばよい。\n:
To get to the army headquarters, just head
straight down the main road to the other side
of the city.

145225.「屋敷の様子が 前に来たときと\n まったく 異なっているキュ。\n 現在の年代:
Kyu? This place looks completely different
from the last time we were here. Let me
check our current time period, kyu.

145226.「<pc>。ボクたちは\n 前に来たときよりも 若干 時が過ぎた状態の\n 屋敷:
We're in the right place, but not the right
time, kyu.

145227.「エテーネルキューブの調律に\n すこし 乱れが 発生していて\n そのせいで:
The Ethernal Kyube is a bit out of tune, kyu.
It sent us off course, kyu.

145228.「今後は このような問題が\n 起こらないよう ボクは\n キューブの制御に 集:
I'm sorry, kyu. I'll keep tinkering with the
kyube's systems so that something like this
doesn't happen again, kyu.

145229.「その代わり 今後は\n エテーネルキューブの起動判断は\n <pc>に まかせ:
Also, from now on I'll let you decide when
we use the kyube, kyu.

145230.<pc>は エテーネルキューブとして\n銀色の箱を 使えるようになった！<me: <pc> can now use the Ethernal Cube!<me 71>

145231.<color_yellow>メインコマンドの 『どうぐ』の中にある\n『エテーネ:
You can use the "Ethenel Cube" in the "Items" section of the main command to go back and forth between the present and the
past.

145232.<color_yellow>過去の世界で訪れた場所が 登録されるほか\n時空のし:
In addition to registering the places you have visited in the past, you can also register them as destinations by
identifying the space-time markers.

145233.<color_yellow>過去では 屋根のある場所でも 使えます。\nまた 『:
You can even use the cube while indoors! To
go back to the present, select
"return to present" at the top of the menu.

145234.「時間が 多少ズレたとはいえ\n ここが エテーネ王国のメレアーデがいた\n 屋:
Even though the time is a bit off, we did
return to Mereade's mansion, kyu.

145235.「メレアーデから預かった 記憶の赤結晶を\n 弟のクオードに渡して 一緒に見るこ:
Our mission is to give that red memory
crystal to Mereade's brother Quard, kyu.

145236.「でも 屋敷の中から キミ以外の人間の\n 生体反応が まったく 感知できないキ:
I can't detect any human bio-signs except
yours, kyu. We should get out of here, kyu.

145237.「可及的すみやかに 屋敷の外へ脱出し\n クオード探索ルートの再構築をするよう\:
Lets find a way out and begin our search for
Quard, kyu.

145238.「ボクは キューブの中に 退避しておくキュ。\n 時の妖精たる者 別時間の存在と:
While you do all that, I'll go get some rest inside the kyube, kyu. It's not a good idea for me to mingle with beings from other
time periods, kyu.

146038.「どうしたの クロちゃん？\n おなか 空いちゃったのかな～？: What's wrong, Charcoal? Are you hungry?

146039.「……あら？ お客様の訪問なんて\n 今日の予定に あったかしら？:
Oh? I didn't know we had a guest scheduled
to visit today.

146040.「あなたとは はじめて 会うわよね。\n ええと。私の名前は メレアーデ。\n:
I don't think we've met before. I'm Mereade,
daughter of the lord of this mansion.

146041.「それで いつ この部屋に入ったの？\n 私 ぜんぜん 気づかなかったわ。\n:
You're pretty amazing. I didn't even hear you
enter. How did you get in here, anyways?

146042.「あなたのファッションも\n ずいぶんと 個性的で 興味深いわ。\n どこのお店:
Your clothes are really unique too. I haven't
seen anything like them before. Where did you
get them?

146043.「……う～ん。なんだか あなた。\n 何が起こったか よく わからない！\n …:
...Hmmm? You've got a weird look on your
face. Are you confused about something?

146044.「……もしかして ここが 有名な\n ドミネウスのお屋敷ってことも\n あなたに:
Did you not realize this was the home of the
famous Domineus?

146045.「でも さすがに このエテーネ王国にいて\n それを知らないってことは ないわよ:
But if you didn't know something like that...
Then you must not be from the Kingdom
of Ethene, right?

146046.「ちょっと待って クオード。\n この人も 何か とまどっているみたい。\n ま:
Quard, wait! You're overreacting. This
person seems to be lost and confused.

146047.「……ねえ。私の声 聞こえる？\n 今 開けるから ちょっと 待ってね。:
Hey, can you hear me? I've almost got the
door open, so just wait a moment.

146049.「まったく あの子ったら\n ひとの話を 聞いてくれなくて\n 本当に 困っちゃ:
He never listens to me. It can be so
annoying sometimes.

146050.「……と 私たちのことは 置いときましょう。:
Oh well. That's not what I came here to talk
about.

146051.「……さて。まずは\n あなたの名前を 教えてくれる？:
Now that we've got some peace and
quiet, why don't you tell me your name?

146052.「……<pc>っていうの？\n そう…… とても ステキな名前ね！:
Your name is <pc>...?
I see...what a great name!

146053.「あなたのこと……。\n クオードは 極悪人のように 言ってたけど\n 私には:
Quard thinks you're some kind of criminal,
but I think he's got the wrong idea about you.

146054.「だって あなたは とても\n 優しそうな目を しているもの……。\n 私 ひと:
I'm a great judge of character, you know...
You have a very kind look in your eyes!

146055.「だから ここから 出してあげる。\n だいじょうぶ。後のことは 心配ないわ。\:
So don't worry, I'll help you get out of here.
Quard already left for the capital, so we
don't have to worry about him anymore.

146056.「それで あなたは\n どうやって ここに 来たの？\n エテーネ王国の人じゃな:
Also, how did you even get here? You don't
seem to be from the Kingdom of Ethene.

146057.「……えっ？ 銀色の箱のチカラで\n ここに とんできたんですって？:
Huh...? You were brought here by the power
of some silver cube?

146058.「あれ……。\n それじゃ あの箱がないと\n 帰ることも できないってことじゃ:
And you need that same silver cube to get
back home...

146059.「でも 心配しないで！\n クオードは この家から\n 箱を 持ちだしたりしてな:
Ah! Don't worry! I don't think Quard took
anything like that out of the house.

146060.「あとで ゆっくり 調べるつもりで\n 自分の部屋に しまってあると思うの。\n:
I'm pretty sure he kept in his room to look
at later. Knowing him, I'm more than sure
that's what he did.

146061.「クオードの部屋を探せば\n きっと 銀色の箱が 見つかるはずよ！:
If we look in Quard's room, we'll definitely
find it!

146062.「あなたは 私のお客さんってことにしてあるから\n すこしくらい うろついても:
Since you're a guest of this mansion, I'll
escort you for a little while. Quard's room
is on the west side of the third floor!

146063.「あら？ 早かったわね。\n そう。ここが クオードの部屋よ。: Oh? That was fast. Yeah. This is Quard's room.

146064.「それじゃ あの子には悪いけど\n 部屋の中を かきまわして\n 銀色の箱とやら:
Okay, let's look for your cube. Quard will be
mad at me later, but don't worry. Be as messy
and thorough as you want in your search.

146065.「ふふっ。なんだか 楽しいわ。\n 何か おもしろいものも 出てくるかも？:
Haha, this is kind of fun. Who knows what
kind of interesting things we'll find in here?

146066.「見つからないわね 箱……。\n 私のカンも にぶっちゃったなあ。:
Sorry. I can't find your cube...and I'm
usually so good at this kind of thing, too.

146067.「おもしろいものも 出てこないし\n ちょっと ガッカリだわ。:
We didn't even find any other interesting
things. What a shame.

146068.「クオードは あの箱を持ったまま\n 王都に 行っちゃったのかなあ。\n う～ん:
Maybe Quard did take it to the capital
after all... Hmmmm...

146069.「……あっ そうだわ。\n ちょっと 玄関にいる執事のジェリナンに\n 話を聞き:
Oh, that's right! We should go talk to our
butler, Gelnian. He's near the front door.

146070.「彼なら 出ていくときのクオードを\n 見かけているはずだから\n そのときの様:
If Quard did take something with him, Gelnian
would have noticed.

146071.「それじゃ １階の玄関まで お願い。\n ジェリナンは すこし 気むずかしい人だ:
Go downstairs to the front door. Gelnian can
be a little annoying to deal with, but he
means well, honest!

146072.「もう～。ジェリナンてば\n 本当に おカタいんだから！:
Aww, come on, Gelnian. You can be so uptight
sometimes!

146073.「あのね。クオードが でかけるとき\n 何か 持ってなかったか 教えてほしいのよ:
I just wanna know if Quard had anything
with him when he left for the capital.

146074.「ああっ まずいわ。\n ジェリナンのお小言が 始まっちゃう！:
Oh, great...you're going to start lecturing
me again!

146075.「はい そこまで！ お小言なら\n あとで いくらでも聞くって 約束するから\n:
Yes, yes, I get it! Look, I promise to listen
to all your lectures later. Right now, just
tell me about Quard, please.

146076.「お待ちになって ジェリナン！\n お客様の前で お説教を始めるのも\n いかが:
Come on, Gelnian. Are you really going to
lecture me in front of our guest. A bit
rude, don't you think?

146077.「……そう。それなら いいの。\n 感謝するわ ジェリナン！:
I see... Well, that's a relief. Thank you,
Gelnian!

146078.「<pc>！ やっぱり あの箱は\n まだ この屋敷の中にあるのよ。:
I knew your cube would still be somewhere
inside the mansion, <pc>!

146079.「クオードが 自分の部屋の他に\n あの箱を 隠しそうな所となると\n う～ん…:
But where else would Quard keep it if
not in his own room... Hmm...

146080.「あっ！ クオードの部屋から\n ここに来るまでの間に テラスの前を通るわ。\n:
Ah! Quard probably passed by the terrace on
his way out. Maybe he left your cube there.

146081.「たしか 今日は 侍女のハーミィが\n テラスの お掃除当番の日ね。\n 彼女が:
If I remember correctly, Hermy is the maid
in charge of cleaning the terrace today.
Maybe she knows something.

146082.「<pc>。\n 次は ハーミィに 話を聞いてみて。\n テラスは ３階の北側よ:
Let's go talk to her. She should be on the
northern side of the third floor!

146083.「うふふ ハーミィ。\n まだ そんなに 緊張しているの？: Hehe. Are you still feeling nervous, Hermy?

146084.「私には そんな かたくるしい言葉を\n 使わなくていいって 言ったでしょ。\n:
I told you, you don't have to use such formal
language around me. Just be yourself.

146085.「彼女は この屋敷に来てから\n まだ 日が浅いの。\n ジェリナンにも しから:
She hasn't been here too long. Gelnian is
always giving her a hard time. Poor girl.

146086.「ふふっ。あやまらなくても いいわ。\n 私たち あなたに 聞きたいことがあって:
No need to apologize. We just want to ask you
a question.

146087.「ちょっとね。探し物をしているの。\n これくらいの 銀色の箱っぽいものなんだけ:
I'm wondering if you saw something. A silver
cube, around this size.

146088.「そう……。じゃあ クオードの様子に\n 変わったところとか なかったかしら？\:
I see... Did you notice anything odd about
Quard's behavior, by any chance? Did he
go out onto the terrace with anything?

146090.「ありがとう ハーミィ。\n じゅうぶん 役に立ったわ。\n ポーラに 会いにい:
Thank you, Hermy. You've been very helpful.
I'm going to go see Paula.

146092.「ポーラが きっと 何かを知っているはずよ。\n 侍女たちの部屋なら この３階に:
Paula might know something. The maid's room
is here on the third floor.

146094.「……あのね ポーラ。\n あなたに 聞きたいことがあるの。\n 正直に 答えて:
Listen, Paula. I have a question for you.
Will you answer me honestly?

146095.「……本当に？\n さっき <pc>に 答えたことも\n ウソではないって 言え:
Truly? And you weren't lying to
<pc> earlier, either?

146096.「私の目を見ながら そう言える？: Can you look me in the eye and say that?

146097.「……ポーラ。\n まだ 何か 隠しているわね？:
...Paula. You're still hiding something,
aren't you?

146098.「あなたが そんな理由で\n 盗みを はたらくような人じゃないって\n 私 知っ:
I know that you are not the kind of person who
would steal for such a reason.

146099.「それなら 屋敷に置いてあるものを\n 持ちだしても よかったはずよ。\n なぜ:
You could have taken anything else in the
mansion. Why take <pc>'s cube?

146100.「この屋敷のものでなければ\n よいなんて考えは まちがっているわ。\n その前:
It's not right to think you can take things
that don't belong to our family. I only wish
you talked to me about this, Paula.

146101.「ねえ <pc>。\n 私から お願いがあるの。\n ポーラを ゆるしてあげてく:
Hey, <pc>. I have a favor to ask.
You'll forgive Paula, won't you...?<yesno><close>

146102.「ポーラも あやまりなさい。\n それとね…… お母さんのことは\n 私に まか:
You should apologize too, Paula. And, um...
Please don't worry about your mother.
I will take care of it.

146103.「なるほど。今は使われていない\n 客間のベッドに 目をつけたわけね。:
I see. The bed in the guest room that's no
longer being used...

146104.「それじゃあ <pc>。\n ２階の 東側の客間を探してみて。\n 今度こそ 銀:
Anyways, let's go to the upstairs guest room.
It's on the east side of the second floor.
We'll find your cube for sure!

146105.「銀色の箱 見つかったのね。\n これで <pc>も ひと安心！:
We found it! Bet you're relieved to have this
back, huh?

146106.「ところで……。ずっと 気になってたけど\n その箱って なんなのかしら？\n:
By the way...I've been wondering what that
cube really is. Quard said it belonged to
Ethene.

146107.「……あなたにも よく わからないの？\n もしかして 帰りかたも わからないっ:
...You really don't know what it is, either?
Don't tell me you don't know how to get
back home, either?

146110.「ああん もう クロちゃんたら。\n そんなに スカートのすそを 引っ張らないで: Ah! Charcoal! Don't pull on my dress!

146111.「ごめんなさい <pc>。\n クロちゃんが 私を呼んでるみたい。\n きっと:
Sorry, <pc>. Charcoal is calling
me. She's probably hungry.

146112.「私 ちょっと 行ってくるわ。\n すぐに戻るから 話の続きは 後でね！:
I'm going to go now. I'll be right back. We'll
talk later!

146114.「<pc>……。\n あなたに これを託したいのです。:
<pc>...I want to entrust you with
this.

146115.「エテーネ王国の王都 キィンベルへ……。\n 私の弟…… クオードに会い\n こ:
You need to go to the Royal City of Kimbel
and give this red memory crystal to my
brother...Quard.

146116.「そして 必ず クオードとともに\n 記憶の赤結晶の内容を 確認するのです。:
Once you've done that, you must view the
contents of the crystal together with him.

146117.「ですが その前に……。\n あなたは 見なければならない。:
But before that...there's something you
need to see.

153052.「そのときの話を わしに聞かせてくれんか？\n ちょうどよい おかずに なりそう:
Would you like to tell me about it?
It would make a good side dish.

156348.「本当に ごめんなさい。\n 弟のクオードは せっかちで……。:
I'm so sorry. My brother Quard is can be
impatient at times...

156349.「……しかたありませんね。\n お答えしましょう。:
...Looks like I have no choice. I shall
answer your question.

156350.「説明は 完了したキュ。\n それじゃ ボクは 失礼するキュ。: That's everything, kyu. I'll leave you to it.

161212.「辺境警備隊より 預かった報告書を\n 軍司令部の 軍団長のもとへ\n 届けにき:
You say you have come to deliver a report
received from the Frontier Guards to the corps
commander at Army Headquarters.

188005.「……ああ。\n どうか そんなことを 言わないで。\n ポーラを ゆるしてあげ:
Oh, don't be like that. Please, won't you
forgive Paula?<yesno><close>

188007.「現在地は レンダーシア大陸。\n ただし キミが知る時間軸より 未来の……\n:
We are currently in the land of Lendersia. The
Lendersia of the future, after the end of
the world, kyu.

188008.<pc>は 床に落ちていた枝に\n足を取られて 転んでしまった！:
<pc> got his foot caught on a branch
on the floor and fell!
